Travel to New Delhi

Importance- New Delhi

Delhi is the Capital of Idia. Also it is one of the biggest cities in India.
The Indian Parliament is in Delhi. The President and the Vice President of India along with all their offices are in New Delhi.
The Prime Minister with all his Cabinet ministers have his office in New Delhi.All the Government Administrrative Offices are functioning from New Delhi.

Transport Facilities:

New Delhi has Domestic as well as International Airport. Also it has a big Railway Station and is functioning as Railway Head Quarters to connect all the trains to all the parts of India.


Tourist Places:
New Delhi has a lot of places to function as Tourist places. People from all over the World visit these tourist Places.

Few of the Tourist Places:

  • Parliament/President Palace
  • Red Fort
  • Zoological Park
  • Qutubminar
  • Bulbulaiah
  • India Gate
  • Lotus Temple
  • Nizamuddin Dargah
  • Indhra Prastha
  • Rajghat

10 New Delhi Rly.Stn. Rajghat 3.2km/13mts

Other Importances:
There are Places of Worship for different Religion Communities. There are different factories, Industries of different kinds which meet the needs of both India as well as other countries through export.

People from all over India live in New Delhi. Also people from other countries also live in New Delhi.
